div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Person|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Person` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Person`. Element `Person` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.identifier`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.active` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.active`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.name` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.name`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.telecom` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.telecom`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.gender` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.gender`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.birthDate` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.birthDate`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.deceased[x]` has a context of Person based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Person`.
Element `Person.address` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.address`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.maritalStatus` has a context of Person based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Person`.
Element `Person.photo` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.photo`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.communication` has a context of Person based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Person`.

Element `Person.communication.language` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Person.communication` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Person.communication.language` has a context of Person based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Person`.

Element `Person.communication.preferred` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Person.communication` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Person.communication.preferred` has a context of Person based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Person`.
Element `Person.managingOrganization` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.managingOrganization`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Person.link` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.link`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Person.link.target` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Person.link` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Person.link.target` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.link.target`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Person.link.assurance` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Person.link` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Person.link.assurance` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Person.link.assurance`, but has no comparisons.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
